name: Sheep Sim
description:
Description

Its a game about management sheeps, where you control the only male sheep and you have to procriate to make money and more sheeps

Game Features

  • Sheep Hunger
  • Sheep Energy
  • Sheep Happiness
  • Sheep Health
  • Original Art
  • Sell Sheeps
  • Clean Shit
  • Control time
  • Sheep Death
  • Original Animations
  • Sheep Babies
  • Sheep Names
  • Save Game
  • Load Game
  • Shop System

How to Play

Mouse Only
